name: Dvorak
desc: One of the main organizers of the Iridescence Tour.

customize.name: Xinyan
customize.desc: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

customize.text: A musician who has previously tried to join the Iridescence Tour, but for one reason or another, the event was always postponed.

customize.name: Yaoyao
customize.desc: Streetward Rambler's youngest disciple. A gentle and caring "little adult."

customize.text: The person who saved Dvorak after he had fallen into the water on his way to Liyue Harbor.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue â€” but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

customize.text: The people who Dvorak collaborated with so that the Iridescence Tour could be officially hosted in Liyue Harbor.

value.text:
[V3.4] The Exquisite Night Chimes
[V4.6] Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness

imgDesc.text: Dvorak during the Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness.
